to suffer (from illness)/to contract (a disease)/misfortune/trouble/danger/worry

sentences.english: John and Jack went through many troubles together to become foul weather friends.
sentences.chinese: 約翰和傑克經歷了許多麻煩，一起成爲患難之交。

sentences.english: A poor friend, because a friend in need is a friend indeed.
sentences.chinese: 貧窮的朋友，因爲患難之交是真情。

sentences.english: Thailand and China enjoy brotherly relations and are sincere friends sharing weal and woe.
sentences.chinese: 泰中兩國情同手足，是患難之交和真誠的朋友。

sentences.english: Your friend in adversity may be among the best of your friends. He is the most patient and cheerful spiritual companion.
sentences.chinese: 患難之交可以成爲摯友，他最有耐心而令人愉悅。

sentences.english: We all knew that a friend in need is a friend indeed.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道，患難之交纔是真朋友。

sentences.english: A friend indeed is a friend in need.
sentences.chinese: 患難見真情和患難之交纔是真正的朋友。
